The film features a stellar cast including Matthew McConaughey and Anne Hathaway, and it will surely keep you on the edge of your seat!

If you're interested in a more detective-like adventure, "Young Sherlock Holmes" might be right up your alley. Set in an academy where strange events occur, a young Sherlock Holmes investigates the mysterious deaths of several people, and it stars Nicholas Rowe as a teenage Sherlock. Enjoy the intrigue!
